name: Frontline
description: Frontline is a sales deal management platform that replaces long, error prone forms with an AI enhanced conversational interface. It helps sales reps capture, share, and manage deal data faster and more reliably, turning a redundant form workflow into an fast, enjoyable conversational experience.

name: DefendOps
description: DefendOps is a vulnerability management and security assessment platform that helps companies discover, monitor, and remediate vulnerabilities across public and internal assets. The product centralizes scan results, integrations, and remediation workflows so security teams can act faster and more confidently.

name: UpperLeap: A Gaming Boosting Platform
description: UpperLeap is a gaming boosting platform designed to connect players with professional boosters. The platform streamlines the process of ordering, tracking, and completing boosting services, ensuring a seamless experience for users.
content: # UpperLeap: A Gaming Boosting Platform **Tech Stack:** Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Zustand, SignalR --- ## Overview UpperLeap is a cutting-edge gaming boosting platform designed to connect players with professional boosters. The platform streamlines the process of ordering, tracking, and completing boosting services, ensuring a seamless experience for users. --- ## My Role As the **Front-End Developer**, I was responsible for building a responsive and user-friendly interface, ensuring seamless integration of design and functionality. --- ## Key Features I Developed - **Dynamic Order Tracking:** Implemented real-time order status updates using **SignalR**, ensuring users can track their progress live. - **Customizable Orders:** Built interactive forms for selecting game ranks, divisions, and additional options with responsive validation. - **User Dashboard:** Designed and developed a personalized dashboard for users to view their order history, progress, and notifications. --- ## Challenges & Solutions - **Challenge:** Managing dynamic data updates without reloading the page. **Solution:** Utilized Zustand for state management, ensuring a smooth and efficient user experience. - **Challenge:** Designing a clean and intuitive UI for complex order workflows. **Solution:** Collaborated closely with the design team to implement a streamlined interface, emphasizing usability. --- ## Impact - Achieved a **30% increase in user engagement** by implementing a sleek, mobile-friendly design. - Boosted platform credibility with faster load times and a visually appealing interface.
